cause.description:
System of a Down made a video for their song BOOM! showing the largest demonstration of peace in the world. I advise everyone who reads this to gpo on youtube and search it up. While there search up "Soldier Side" by em as well. This one was a fan made video demonstrating how everything Bush touches is burnt to the ground. No donations please
1. Bush is an idiot
2. Give him the finger
3. Make him see what he's done
cause.name: BOOM! (SOAD)
